text: Yelp, Inc. is a company that operates a social networking, user review, and local search web site of the same name. Over 31 million people access Yelp's website each month, putting it in the top 150 of U.S. Internet web sites. ==References== ==Other websites== * Yelp USA * Yelp Canada * Yelp United Kingdom * Yelp Ireland * Yelp business owner portal Category:2004 establishments in the United States Category:Companies based in San Francisco Category:American social networking websites
title: Yelp, Inc.
